// Registers:
//
//   Name                          Reg   Size
//   ----------------------------- ----- ----
//   ViewProjectionMatrix          c0       4
//   LocalToWorld                  c6       4

//   TerrainLayerCoordinateOffset  c11      1
//   InvMaxTesselationLevel_ZScale c12      1
//   InvTerrainSize_SectionBase    c13      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c4, 256, -32768, 0.5, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_texcoord o0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 o1.xy
    dcl_texcoord4 o2
    dcl_position o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mad r0.x, v0.w, c4.x, v0.z
    add r0.x, r0.x, c4.y
    mul r0.z, r0.x, c12.y
    mov r1.x, c12.x
    mad r0.xy, v0, r1.x, c13.zwzw
    add o0.xyz, r0, c11
    add r0.xy, r0, c4.z
    mul o1.xy, r0, c13
    mul r0.xy, c12.x, v0
    mul r1, r0.y, c7
    mad r1, c6, r0.x, r1
    mad r0, c8, r0.z, r1
    add r0, r0, c9
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c10.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c10, r0

mov o3, r0 // Relocated from line 53 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 1E1A26F7.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o2, r0

//     mov o3, r0 // Relocated to line 52 with shadertool.py

// approximately 21 instruction slots used
